ygData.messageBody:
--- mark mark <markerob@...> wrote:
> how hard are the dry bones to kill, and how often

Dry Bones are about level 16-20, and are spell casting
MOBs. Be wary. They hit hard and will throw fire,
especially, at you which can cause the Health bar to
melt away. Best tackled with help.

===
:D
